Text: Are those retail dvd-s or  converted from divx ?
Excellent documentary series but how's the quality?

These are DVDs that I converted from 320 x 240 MPEG-1. Quality is overall good.  NTSC (but any modern DVD player should auto-convert between NTSC and PAL, AFIAK)

If you want the MPGs, get them here: 

http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3439841
